reviews.text: Carpet Depot is awesome and the people are great!  Always on top of everything with smiles.  Sarah and Jeremy are the best with schedules, cost, and product quality.  Will always recommend them. ðŸ˜Š. Could not be happier with the customer service, the quality of the floor and the installation.  Very nice caring people.  The Shepard family in Hickory Flat.
Jeremy did a phenomenal job and was so patient with our selecting an LVP color/style! The entire crew was impressive! Overall, we could not be happier!!!!!! Thank you!!!!!

We had a great experience with the Carpet Depot team and would definitely use them again! Jeremy made the process easy and the install team was quick, courteous and did a great job!

We had 2 bedrooms and our stairs carpeted , with a style they carry in stock, and they removed the old stuff too!

We  were able to easily order, schedule,  and install all within a few days!

Carpet Depot Woodstock...what a find.  Our first interaction was with Jeremy Eaves and he was phenomenal.  Helped us find our perfect LVP flooring and carpet in a matter of minutes.  Matt was able to come out in a few days to get all of our rooms measured and we were put on the schedule to be installed that same week.  Juan and his team were superb in getting all of the old flooring up and new down in just 2 days.  We are very happy with the quality of product from Carpet Depot and the level of service received from Jeremy, Matt and Juan.  Fair pricing, quick service and friendly staff.  Definitely give them a call for your next flooring project.  THANK YOU!!!

A neighbor recommended the Carpet Depot in Woodstock when I was looking for a remnant to be bound for our master bathroom.  Woodstock had a great selection to choose from and it was done the next day.!  Wonderful speedy service.  Thank you, Carpet Depot Woodstock!
